mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interior(num, userId, subject, content, category, hitCount, register_date) VALUES(#{num}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{category}, 0, SYSDATE)

choose.otherwise: ( INSTR(subject, #{keyword}) > 0 OR DBMS_LOB.INSTR(content, #{keyword}) > 0 OR INSTR(userId , #{keyword}) > 0 OR TO_CHAR(register_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{keyword} OR TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{keyword} )

mapper.select:
SELECT num, userId, subject, content, category, hitCount, register_date FROM interior
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
